title: The Moonstone - narrator's attitude toward people

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Collins uses literary elements and techniques to convey the narrator’s complex attitude toward the people he describes.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Collins uses literary elements and techniques to convey the narrator’s complex attitude toward the people he describes.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
